text: @GregAbbott_TX @GovAbbott Novel viruses come & go, its mother nature. No person or country can be 100% ready. Interesting listening to politicians & others who are millionaires or have no FEARS of living REALITY.  Americans understand the risk of #coronavirus. Open the state responsibility & save lives.
